title: The Collaborative Law Firm Part II: Multi-User Chat
description: There are many communication options beyond traditional office memos, email, and telephones. In a previous post, we discussed instant message services, which have certain advantages and disadvantages for professional teams. In this post, we compare several team-based chat applications that are specifically designed to facilitate communication within and among teams in organizations of various sizes. We review a few of the most popular, and most feature-rich applications in this category and describe the pros and cons of each.
